laboratory_examinations.findings: Hematocrit 38% (initial), 34% (1 month later), 27% (after 3 months); white-cell count normal; platelet count normal; ESR 68 mm/hr (initial), 104 mm/hr (1 month later), >120 mm/hr (after 3 months)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hematocrit decreased over time from 38% to 27%; ESR increased significantly over the same period.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Alkaline phosphatase 354 U/L (normal range, 35-130), Alanine aminotransferase 71 U/L (normal range, 7-52), Aspartate aminotransferase 57 U/L (normal range, 9-30), Ferritin 828 Î¼g/L (normal range, 10-170)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Abnormal liver function test results were noted before surgery, which normalized immediately after surgery.
